author: James Martin
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Stuff each fig with a wedge of Stilton and press halves back together. Place on a baking tray and drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil. Place into the oven for eight to ten minutes, until hot and bubbling. Remove from the oven and serve with a mixed salad.
ingredients: 2 figs, cut open,  55g/2oz Stilton cheese,  balsamic vinegar,  olive oil,  mixed salad leaves, to serve
